content: Here's a puzzle for you: Can you come up with a valid email address for the name "John Smith" that doesn't contain any of the letters "o", "h", "n", "s", "m", "i", "t", or "h"? Remember to include the "@" symbol and a valid domain name. Good luck!

Email: j_4@abc.com

In this email address:
- "j_4" serves as a creative representation of the name without using the restricted letters.
- "abc.com" is a simple and valid domain name that doesn't contain any of the restricted letters.
